data.text: Eyi ne asɛm a efi Awurade nkyɛn baa odiyifo Yeremia hɔ a ɛfa aman no ho.
Nea ɛfa Misraim ho:
“Siesie wo nkatabo akɛse ne nketewa nyinaa,
Munsiesie apɔnkɔ no,
Dɛn na mihu?
Ɔhoɔharefo ntumi nguan,
“Hena, na ɔma ne homene so sɛ Asubɔnten Nil,
Misraim ma ne homene so sɛ Nil,
Monkɔ mo anim, apɔnkɔ!
Nanso da no yɛ Awurade, Asafo Awurade dea,
“Foro kɔ Gilead kogye aduru
Amanaman no bɛte wʼanimguase;
Eyi ne asɛm a Awurade ka kyerɛɛ odiyifo Yeremia a ɛfa Babiloniahene Nebukadnessar ba a ɔbɛba abɛtow ahyɛ Misraim so:
“Mommɔ eyi ho dawuru wɔ Misraim, na mompae mu nka wɔ Migdol;
Adɛn nti na mo dɔmmarima bɛbotow sɛɛ?
Wobehintihintiw atoatoa so;
Ɛhɔ na wɔbɛteɛ mu se,
“Ampa ara sɛ mete ase yi” Ɔhene a
Mommoaboa mo nneɛma ano ntwɛn nnommumfa,
“Misraim yɛ nantwi ba bere a ne ho yɛ fɛ,
Asraafo apaafo a wɔwɔ wɔn mu no
Misraim bɛteɛ mu sɛ ɔwɔ a ɔreguan
Wɔbɛsɛe ne kwae,”
Wobegu Misraim Babea anim ase,
Asafo Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn, ka se, “Mede asotwe reba Tebes nyame Amon, Farao, Misraim ne nʼanyame ne nʼahemfo ne wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to Farao so no so.
Mede wɔn bɛhyɛ wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wokum wɔn no, Babiloniahene Nebukadnessar ne nʼadwumayɛfo no nsa. Nanso akyiri no, nnipa bɛtena Misraim asase so te sɛ kan no,” Awurade na ose.
“Nsuro, Yakob me somfo;
Nsuro, Yakob me somfo;
